page.title: 12Trade in Trefriw.
page.content: Trefriw is fortunate to have a butcher supplying fresh meat and greengrocery, a grocer/greengrocer,2 newsagents<one selling also sweets and tobacco,the other hardware> and a gift shop.There is a post office, a hairdresser,and a veterinary surgery,but no doctor's surgery!A small garden centre supplies plants. The Trefriw Woollen Mill has a shop & showroom for garments,blankets, rugs, quilts, knitting wools and tweed by the yard.It is an old-established family-run business,utilising electric power from the stream falling through the village.The mill is visited daily by hundreds of tourists in the summer.They can see all stages of production from the initial fleece to the finished garment.There is also a flourishing export trade.
